about_the_game:
This DLC grants access to the following additional 25 playable songs:
  • POKER FACE
  • Paranoia
  • Trance Dance Anarcky
  • The Karasu Wind
  • SACRIFICE
  • Museimei Saafesu
  • PanneDemonology
  • Christmas Bomb!!
  • Uki Yomichi (feat. Ranko, Utenkekkou)
  • Hell's Sun
  • Gensou Syndrome
  • Entrusting this World to Idols(marasy piano ver.)
  • Hitorisizuka（Marcia Cover Version）
  • Saigetsu
  • Dial Connected
  • Bad Apple!! feat.nomico (Tetsuya Komuro Remix)
  • Hanamaru! Saikyo Hyper Cirno
  • Tenkyuu Tenge Otohanabi
  • Howling
  • Onerule・Gamechanger
  • Genmu
  • Gensou no Satellite
  • INTERNET SURVIVOR
  • M. O. N. E. Y. (Dankagu Special REMIX Ver.)
  • Love-colored Master Spark
